daily_fact: New Yorkers are actively shaping their community's future with a roadmap that emphasizes collaboration and innovation, as highlighted in a recent op-ed by the New York Amsterdam News.
topline_md: New York City is facing significant changes as it delays the All-Electric Buildings Act, while Amazon cuts 700 jobs in NYC as part of a larger 30,000 position reduction; meanwhile, advocates push for a universal daylighting bill and the city unveils rules for a basement apartment legalization pilot program.

civics_politics.title: Civics & Politics
